identity.name: PulseFit
identity.mission: The first neurodivergent-aware fitness app that adapts to your brain.

layout_strategy.containers: max-w-md mx-auto md:max-w-2xl min-h-screen relative overflow-hidden

buttons.primary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full bg-primary text-primary-foreground font-bold hover:scale-105 active:scale-95 transition-all shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(139,92,246,0.5)]
buttons.ghost: h-12 px-6 rounded-full hover:bg-white/10 text-white font-medium transition-colors
buttons.destructive: h-12 px-8 rounded-full bg-red-600 text-white font-bold hover:bg-red-700

cards.default: rounded-3xl border border-white/10 bg-zinc-900/50 backdrop-blur-md shadow-xl
cards.highlight: rounded-3xl border border-primary/50 bg-primary/10 backdrop-blur-md shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(139,92,246,0.2)]

textures.noise: bg-[url('https://grainy-gradients.vercel.app/noise.svg')] opacity-20 mix-blend-overlay fixed inset-0 pointer-events-none z-50
textures.scanlines: bg-[linear-gradient(rgba(18,16,16,0)_50%,rgba(0,0,0,0.25)_50%),linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(255,0,0,0.06),rgba(0,255,0,0.02),rgba(0,0,255,0.06))] z-40 bg-[length:100%_4px,3px_100%] pointer-events-none fixed inset-0 opacity-20

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure all text has 4.5:1 contrast against background.
accessibility.touch_targets: All interactive elements must be at least 44x44px.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Setup Shadcn UI with 'zinc' base color.
2. Install 'framer-motion' for ADHD micro-interactions and 'lucide-react' for icons.
3. Create a global 'ThemeContext' that manages 'mode' (standard | adhd | asd).
4. When 'asd' mode is active, override all 'framer-motion' components to have { duration: 0 }.
5. Use the 'zones' color object for all heart rate displays. Do not hardcode colors in components.
6. Build the 'Sensory Control Panel' as a priority feature in Settings.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Avoid centered layouts for heavy text.
Use pill-shaped buttons for primary actions.
Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
